channel.title: covid19 on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch
channel.description: Recent content in covid19 on Nuttaphat Arunoprayoch

item.title: COVID-19 Vaccination Log
item.description: On 18-Aug-2020, Taiwan finally opened its first appointment for locally-made vaccine MVC COVID-19. As this will be the very first rollout of the vaccine, there are still some doubts towards the safety of the vaccine. However, I am confident that the vaccine will be safe and effective; therefore I decided to register to receive my first dose on 23-Aug-2020. I will keep updating this log as I receive more information before and after receiving my first dose.

item.title: COVID19 API
item.description: API for exploring covid-19 cases around the globe powered by FastAPI framework Introduction As going through 2020, it is clear that the year of the Rat has NOT been friendly at all. We have experienced a series of fierce events. For instance, the tension among global giants, protesting, Australian bushfire season, extreme racial discrimination, and noticeably the COVID-19 pandemic. COVID-19 has been spreading rapidly without showing any signs of stopping or even slowing down.
